name: Yoshiwara Rose 2 A Cycle Of Guilt
summary: 2nd part of the full movie about Yoshiwara red-light district in Japan. It all starts with a song by Asa featuring Yoshiwara Lament about a woman of the historical Yoshiwara red-light district. This goes as a parody for Dead or Alive video game. A ninja girl Ayane receives an important task. She'll have to save Rose O Jiao Sama. However Yoishiwara is full of prostitutes, shows and other sexy things to do. A public gang bangs inside the brothels, lot of different humiliations and many more for your attention. In between massive sex scenes you'll follow the story and enjoy English/Japanese subtitles for a better understanding. So many interesting things like eating sushi from the naked body of Geisha, drinking a cocktail from the boobs and many more.
